message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at $140. I believe it offers a great value at this price. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $140 is already a very competitive price for this product. How about we meet halfway and settle at $125?
I'm getting closer to making a decision, but I still think $110 is a more reasonable price for me. Would you be willing to go down to $115?
